metadata.description:
The owner of this official 88mph's anthem NFT will receive 888 $USDT + 1.65% fixed APR + 21% $MPH APR back by October 19, 2021. Use this NFT to withdraw the USDT deposit + interest generated after the maturity date is reached.

In addition, the owner will receive an NFT representing the vested MPH rewards tied to the USDT deposit in order to claim an additional yield of 0.37 MPH at maturity (+21% APR at current MPH value). 

The total value available at maturity (incl. MPH) will be ~$905

"88 Miles Per Hour" has been commissioned in April 2021 from "Holland", a 88mph community member.

This is an experiment.

***
Deposit NFTs are not burnt at any point, to preserve their artistic value. In other words, you can withdraw safely their intrinsic value without damaging the creative content. A nice souvenir from 88mph.

NFT Includes unlockable original HD copy.
